help.text:
I look at messages posted in here since yesterday.
I only care about messages that have :red_circle:, :large_blue_circle:, or :white_circle:.
If a messages has :eyes: reaction, it's in progress. 
If it has a :white_check_mark:, it's done. Otherwise, it's still pending.

help.pretext: To publish this to the channel type `/triage publish`.
